desc: [Not Scrollable] This UI consists of a toolbar with menu, logo, search and more options buttons, a horizontal scrollable tab layout with options like Top Stories, Video, My News, Popular and LIVE, and a scrollable content list of various news cards with each card featuring a clickable image, title, info, link to the article and an optional advertisement section at the bottom. The UI also includes a button to expand the image of a news card.
